Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a hotel reservation linking a guest to a room. Tracks check-in status and any amenities added during the stay.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reservation()
    Default constructor.
    Reservation(Guest guest, Room room, int nights)
    Constructor with Arguments for Reservation() Creates a reservation with guest, room, and number of nights.
